name: Roachling Lord
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 10 ft., passive Perception 10

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roachling lord makes two Begrimed Shortsword or Begrimed Dart attacks.

actions.name: Begrimed Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Begrimed Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The roachling is immune to diseases and has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

special_abilities.name: Unpleasant Scent
special_abilities.desc: The roachling has disadvantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks when interacting with Beasts and on Charisma checks when interacting with Humanoids. If the roachling bathes meticulously, it loses this trait for 24 hours.
